title: Trump Asks Supreme Court to Block the House From Obtaining His Tax Returns
description: The request would further delay a long-running request by the House Ways and Means Committee as the midterm election looms.
category: House Committee on Ways and Means
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Lawyers for former President Donald J. Trump asked the Supreme Court to freeze matters while they prepared a formal appeal of a ruling that the House Ways and Means Committee had a right to see his returns.
